abstract: Profile of Steven A Ballmer, former Microsoft chief executive who is now the first-year owner of Los Angeles Clippers; Ballmer, worth some $24 billion, is known both for his loud assertiveness and his regular-guy appearance; his ownership has been welcomed by many as clean break from team's past under disgraced former owner Donald Sterling.
lead_paragraph: Ballmer, the former chief executive of Microsoft and the first-year owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, is, in the words of the team’s coach, “the most normal $24 billion guy I know.”

headline.main: Steven A. Ballmer Speaks Loudly and Carries a Big Wallet
headline.print_headline: Speaking Loudly, Carrying a Big Wallet
